cleanFurnace.description: Clean burners and check furnace operation

serviceHeatPump.description: Professional heat pump inspection and servicing

cleanDryerVent.description: Remove lint buildup from dryer exhaust vent

replaceWaterFilter.description: Change refrigerator or whole-house water filter

cleanDishwasherFilter.description: Remove and clean dishwasher filter and spray arms

aerateLawn.description: Core aeration of lawn for better water and nutrient absorption

mulchGardenBeds.title: Mulch garden beds
mulchGardenBeds.description: Apply fresh mulch to garden beds

winterizeSprinklerSystem.title: Winterize sprinkler system
winterizeSprinklerSystem.description: Blow out irrigation lines and shut off water

testSumpPump.description: Pour water into sump pit to test pump operation

flushWaterHeater.description: Drain sediment from water heater tank

checkForLeaks.description: Inspect under sinks, around toilets, and exposed pipes

testGfciOutlets.description: Press test button on all GFCI outlets

testSmokeDetectors.title: Test smoke detectors
testSmokeDetectors.description: Test all smoke and CO detectors, replace batteries

replaceSmokeDetectorBatteries.title: Replace smoke detector batteries
replaceSmokeDetectorBatteries.description: Replace batteries in all smoke and CO detectors

checkWeatherstripping.title: Check weatherstripping
checkWeatherstripping.description: Inspect and replace worn weatherstripping on doors and windows

cleanKitchenExhaustFan.title: Clean kitchen exhaust fan
cleanKitchenExhaustFan.description: Remove and clean range hood filters
